Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists in the final quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis expressed admiration for LeBron James's sustained performance and ability to continue scoring even when he looks to sit out
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers outscored the Kings 44-33 in the fourth quarter
All five of L.A.'s starters scored at least 16 points against the Kings
The team went 14-of-34 from beyond the arc
